name: Battle System Prototype v1
description:
This is a battle system prototype for the RPG that I'm working on. Use the controls outlined below to go through the list of things to try and leave some feedback for me!

Controls
  • Move with the arrow keys
  • Battle with the on-screen buttons
Things to try
  • Leave town by moving your character to the bottom of the screen
  • Initiate a random enemy encounter in the forest (clear square area at the bottom right of map outside town)
  • Initiate a random enemy encounter at the beach (clear square area at the top left of map outside town)
  • Win a battle
  • Lose a battle
  • Attack an enemy's weakness
  • Attack an enemy's resistance
  • Stack two magic attacks
  • Finish a turn in battle in less than 1 second and notice where your progress bar begins before your next turn
  • Finish a turn in battle in more than 5 seconds and notice where your progress bar begins before your next turn
  • Finish a turn with a regular attack where the number of seconds is equal to the number of remaining enemies and notice what happens
  • Land a critical hit
  • Leave a comment with some feedback on what you liked or what you think could be improved!
